channel.title: How can i make my npc's sell items?
channel.description: On my server i dont have alot of shops so i want to make some npc's selling the items i choose:D id like all the shops located in one area if anyone knows how?, p.s i no all the item codes if that helps...

item.title: How can i make my npc's sell items?
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

did you compile it first? and is the autospawn.java in the same folder as .class? if your not sure about that just make sure there are two files named autospawn next to eachother, and recompile + restart.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make my npc's sell items?

item.title: How can i make my npc's sell items?
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

ok first g to auto spawn, and u gotta make a npc spawn. the npc has to already have a shop open. like, you want to make a store, so spawn the guy from any shop if he/she has a trade button. after that, go to shop.cfg and find the shop that the particular npc u chose runs. then edit the items in the shop to whatever you want them to be. remember the npc you choose to host the shop has to already have a shop open. if you need anymore help just tell me.

Read full topic
